CSVWriter¶

class CSVWriter.CSVWriter¶

Bases: writer.ReportWriter.ReportWriter

A writer class that writes extracted VFT reports to a .csv file

update(newReport: models.VFTReport.VFTReport, originalReportPath: str)¶

Commits all changes to a report from the user.

Parameters

  • newReport (VFTReport) – The new values for the report.

  • originalReportPath (str) – The path to the original file.

write(reportList: List[models.VFTReport.VFTReport], filepath: str)¶

Writes a list of VFT reports to a file.

Parameters

  • reportList (List[VFTReport]) – The list of reports to be saved to a file.

  • filepath (str) – The path to the .csv file.
